query:
SELECT l.id, l.nome, l.email, 
       (SELECT u.name FROM gestor_lojas gl 
        JOIN gestores g ON gl.gestorId = g.id 
        JOIN users u ON g.userId = u.id 
        WHERE gl.lojaId = l.id LIMIT 1) as gestor_nome
FROM lojas l 
WHERE l.email LIKE '%castanheira%' OR l.email LIKE '%truckservice%' OR l.nome LIKE '%Viseu sm%'
ORDER BY l.nome
